title: Best Quality Quick-Dry Non-Slip Home Mat ? Absorbent, Washable Square Floor Mat for Bathroom, Kitchen & Entryway - Random Color
description:
Best Quality Quick-Dry Non-Slip Home Mat ? Absorbent, Washable Square Floor Mat for Bathroom, Kitchen & Entryway - Random Color
Product Description:
Upgrade your bathroom experience with this Magical Water Absorbent Anti-Slip Mat, designed for both comfort and functionality. With a slim profile of 2.5mm, this mat offers a modern, sleek look without compromising on performance.

Key Features:
? Super Absorbent & Quick-Dry:

Efficiently soaks up water to keep your floors dry and clean after showers or washing.

? Anti-Slip Rubber Base:

The sturdy rubber backing prevents slipping, ensuring safety on wet bathroom floors.

? Premium Material:

Upper: Napa leather-type fabric for a soft, elegant finishBase: Durable anti-slip rubber for long-lasting grip
? Size: Approx. 24 inches (Length) x 16 inches (Width)

Thickness: 2.5mm ? slim and space-saving
